Hero.description:
Part of the nutrition you apply always remains in the soil or substrate. Result: the plant doesn't use its full potential.

PlantiPower ALL12 transports all 12 essential nutrients to the root, making the plant more vital and growing more efficiently.

GrowerFocus.title: We change nothing.
GrowerFocus.description: Your nutrition schedule is the foundation of your success. PlantiPower is developed to strengthen this foundation, not replace it. We provide the technological support for stable uptake and consistent results, in every phase of cultivation.

usps.title: Your schedule remains leading
usps.desc: No adjustments needed in EC or pH. PlantiPower integrates seamlessly.

usps.title: Immediately visible result
usps.desc: Better uptake means an immediately more vital and resilient crop.

usps.title: Keep doing what you're good at
usps.desc: PlantiPower does the rest in the background.

CropResults.title: Validated
CropResults.description: From tomato to cucumber cultivation: PlantiPower maximizes absorption capacity in every professional setting.

crops.name: Tomato Cultivation
crops.stats_0_desc: Consistent weight and higher brix value.

crops.name: Cucumber Cultivation
crops.stats_1_desc: Faster cycle due to transport efficiency.

GlobalStandard.title: Dutch quality.
GlobalStandard.desc: Started in the agricultural heart of Venlo, the Netherlands, now a leading solution for professional growers worldwide.

reviews.name: Tomato Grower
reviews.text: Since adding PlantiPower to our schedule, we see a clear difference: stronger plants, fuller blooms, and a shorter growth cycle. All without extra additives.

reviews.name: Herb Grower
reviews.text: What appeals to me is that PlantiPower doesn't just give results, it truly strengthens the plant. Less loss, better absorption, and 100% natural. Exactly what the sector needs.

ProblemSection.title: The problem in
ProblemSection.description: In a perfect world, every gram of nutrition you provide is actually absorbed by the plant. The reality is different. Factors such as pH fluctuations, cold water, or imbalance in the root zone often cause blockages.
ProblemSection.quote: "This causes unused nutrients to remain in the substrate - a waste of investment and a burden on the crop."
ProblemSection.closing: By removing these 'blockers' with PlantiPower, you get the most out of your existing schedule.

About.metaDesc: PlantiPower originated from practice. We develop natural solutions that support plants in their natural processes.
About.heroDesc: PlantiPower is developed with science, but always originates from the experience of growers. Only what works for plant and grower stands the test of time.
About.visionDesc: Healthy growth starts with balance. We support the natural processes of the plant without forcing them.
About.coreDesc: We believe that healthy growth starts with balance. Not by forcing growth, but by supporting processes that already take place in the plant.
About.approachDesc: We develop products that support plants in their natural processes. By dealing more smartly with what is already present, our solutions contribute to uniform growth and a better functioning cultivation system.

values.title: Resilience
values.desc: Respect for plant, soil and environment.

About.whoWeAreDesc: "Our products are developed for professional growers focused on quality, stability and efficiency. Growers who build for the long term."
About.productionTitle: Developed and produced in the Netherlands
About.productionDesc: PlantiPower is developed and produced in close cooperation with growers and agricultural specialists. Products are tested under realistic conditions and refined based on practical experience.
productionPoints: Can be combined with existing schedules
About.missionDesc: "To develop natural, practical solutions that help growers make their cultivation more stable, efficient and future-proof."

Contact.title: Get in touch
Contact.desc: Do you want to optimize your cultivation and get more yield from your crops? Request a sample or contact us for personalized advice.
Contact.successMsg: Thanks for your message. We will contact you as soon as possible.

Contact.metaDesc: Contact PlantiPower for questions, advice, or partnerships.

ContactPage.title: Get in
ContactPage.description: Do you have questions about our products or want to become a partner? We are here for you.
ContactPage.metaDesc: Contact PlantiPower. Questions about products, partnerships or distribution? We are happy to help.

FAQ.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED
FAQ.metaDesc: Frequently asked questions about PlantiPower biostimulants, usage, and partnership opportunities.

items.a: PlantiPower is a natural nutrient transporter that delivers fertilizers directly to plant roots. It helps plants absorb nutrients more efficiently, resulting in stronger growth, higher yield, and better soil health.

items.q: How often should I apply PlantiPower?
items.a: For optimal results, we recommend monthly application. Consult product information for specific dosages per crop.
No, it's a biostimulant that enhances existing fertilizers.

items.q: Can I use it with other fertilizers?
items.a: Yes, it works synergistically with all standard programs.
It improves root absorption capacity and facilitates mineral transport.
All12 is available in 1 liter, 10 liter, and 1000 liter. Shield is available in 1 liter and 5 liter. Custom quantities/packaging available upon request.

items.q: Which crops is PlantiPower suitable for?
items.a: Suitable for vegetables, fruits, ornamentals, and trees.

items.q: Is PlantiPower safe for all plants?
items.a: Yes, when used as directed it is safe for all plants.
Higher yield, better quality, efficient fertilizer use.

items.q: Can I use it in hydroponics?
items.a: Yes, excellent for hydroponics and substrates.
Yes, contributes to sustainability by reducing leaching.
The ALL12 technology improving fundamental absorption capacity.
Mix with water and apply via irrigation system.
